examples: This essay is not of an acceptable standard - do it again.

definitions.definition: a moral rule that should be obeyed:
examples: Most people agree that there are standards (of behaviour) that need to be upheld.

definitions.definition: usual rather than special, especially when thought of as being correct or acceptable:
examples: White is the standard colour for this model of refrigerator.

definitions.definition: Language described as standard is the form of that language that is considered acceptable and correct by most educated users of it:
examples: Most announcers on the BBC speak standard English.

definitions.definition: A standard book or writer is the one that is most commonly read for information on a particular subject:
examples: Her book is still a standard text in archaeology, even though it was written more than 20 years ago.
